head.name: Junghwan Yim
head.introduction: Data and Software Engineer solving problems with software development skills, analysis skills, and board data domain. Experienced in all processes of data driven software development including research (data collection, explore, analysis), design, development, testing, and deploying. Experienced leading and operating teams or communities as a president or a project manager and achieving remarkable achievements with teams. I am a fast learner and a problem solver with sharing what I learn with to team, which maximizes productivity.

degrees: Master of Science in Computational Physics
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

education.institution: State University at New York in Fredonia
degrees: Bachelor of Science in Physics with Pre-Law
Bachelor of Science in Business Administration (Music Industry)

publications.title: EarPPG: Securing Your Identity with Your Ears
Simulation of Brownian Motion in Dissipative System and Comparison with Langevin Equation

award.title: Meritorious Service Medal
award.institution: Republic of Korea Cyber Operation Command

career.career_title: Graduate Student Researcher (Data Scientist, Software Developer)

설명: - 다양한 데이터 이미지, 동영상, 음성, 음악, 랭귀지, 바이오메트릭, imu sensor, LiDAR, financial data 등 다양한 데이터를 수집하는 (Crawler, Realtime, multi-processing, multi-sensor, Aduino, RasberryPi, Bluetooth) 소프트웨어를 제작함
- 다양한 데이터와 모델을 검증할 수 있는 (UnrealEngine, Python, C++, Fortarn, Javascript) 시뮬레이션을 개발하고,  CUDA, OpenMP를 이용하여 시스템에 최적화함
- 데이터를 안전하게 처리할 수 있는 데이터 파이프라인을 구축함
- 다양한 데이터를 분석하는 머신러닝, 딥러닝, 강화학습, 분석적, 통계적 모델을 디자인하고 구축함
- 다양한 모델을 학습시키는 프로세스를 자동화하는 프로세스 및 프로그램을 구축하고 모델을 최적화시킴
- 모델들을 배포할 수 있는 (Android, iOS, ROS, RTOS 등) 시스템을 디자인하고 구축 및 운영함
- 데이터 프로젝트의 일련의 과정을 클라우드를 사용하여 자동화 코드로 관리함
- 소통과 계획적인 일정 조율을 통해 데이터 프로젝트나 개발 프로젝트를 성공적으로 이끔
- 글쓰기 스킬과 소통 능력을 통해 논문 및 프리젠테이션을 작정하고, 다양한 프로젝트와 논문을 성공적으로 작성함
description: - Various data (Crawler, Realtime, multi-processing, multi-sensor, Aduino, RasberryPi, Bluetooth) software that collects various data such as image, video, voice, music, language, biometric, imu sensor, LiDAR, and financial data produced
- Develop simulations (UnrealEngine, Python, C++, Fortarn, Javascript) that can verify various data and models, and optimize the system using CUDA and OpenMP
- Building a data pipeline that can safely process data
- Design and build machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, analytic and statistical models that analyze a variety of data
- Build processes and programs that automate the process of training various models and optimizing them
- Design, build and operate systems (Android, iOS, ROS, RTOS, etc.) to deploy models
- Managing a series of data projects with automation code using the cloud
- Successfully lead a data project or development project through communication and deliberate scheduling
- Decide on thesis and presentation through writing skills and communication skills, and successfully write various projects and thesis

descriptio: 처음부터 조직을 기획 및 구성하고 운영하여, 약 500명이 이용하는 플렛폼을 만듦
중고장터, 게시판, 채팅 등의 기능을 제공하는 포털 웹 페이지 UI 및 컨텐츠를 디자인하고 개발함 (Javascript, TypeScript, React, Figma, AdobeXD, Jepline)를 만듦
플렛폼의 서버(AWS, Firebase, GCP, PHP, JSP, Django, REST API, GraphQL, Raddis, Spark, HDFS, Kafka, Elasticsearh) 및 DB(MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, HBASE)를 기획하고 개발 및 운영함
플렛폼를 Docker 컨테이너화 하고 Kubernetes 오케스트레이션함
안드로이드, 아이폰용 모바일 어플리케이션을 (Flutter, Android, Swift) 개발함
자동화 프로세스(Git, GitLab, Jenkins)를 이용해 프로젝트를 운영함
주뉴욕영사관의 지원을 받는 공식 업타운뉴욕 커뮤니티가 됨
description: - Created a platform used by about 500 people by planning, organizing, and operating an organization from scratch
- Designed and developed portal webpage UI and contents that provide functions such as second-hand marketplace, bulletin board, and chatting (Javascript, TypeScript, React, Figma, AdobeXD, Jepline)
- Planning, developing and operating platform servers (AWS, Firebase, GCP, PHP, JSP, Django, REST API, GraphQL, Raddis, Spark, HDFS, Kafka, Elasticsearch) and DB (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, HBASE)
- Docker containerize the platform and orchestrate it with Kubernetes
- Developing mobile applications (Flutter, Android, Swift) for Android and iPhone
- Run the project using an automated process (Git, GitLab, Jenkins)
- Become an Official Uptown New York Community Supported by the New York Consulate

career.place: Republic of Korea Cyber Operation Command

bdescription: - Developed an intelligence system collecting data and assisting analysis using Apache Ecosystem and ELK stack by cooperating with the operation and development team.

- Developed Natural Language Processing, Image Processing, Malware detection modules using Reverse Engineering, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning to analysis the collected data.
- Awarded for contribution and excellency by software development from the commander of ROK Cyber Operation Command, two-star rear admiral.

works.btitle: Designing Inventory Management and Recipe Recommend System
bdescription: - Designed and developed demo for managing ingredients and recipes recommendation system for offering customized recipes based on the ingredients and user data.
- Improved recogniton model for ingredients in a refregiator by analyzing and collecting user data and ingredients in their refregiator.
- Awarded in K-Startup Contest by designing and developing ingredient managing system and recipe recommend system from the commander of ROK Personnel Command, two-star rear admiral.

description: - Developed an intelligence system collecting data and assisting analysis using Apache Ecosystem and ELK stack by cooperating with the operation and development team.

- Developed Natural Language Processing, Image Processing, Malware detection modules using Reverse Engineering, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning to analysis the collected data.
- Awarded for contribution and excellency by software development from the commander of ROK Cyber Operation Command, two-star rear admiral.
- Designed and developed demo for managing ingredients and recipes recommendation system for offering customized recipes based on the ingredients and user data.
- Improved recogniton model for ingredients in a refregiator by analyzing and collecting user data and ingredients in their refregiator.
- Awarded in K-Startup Contest by designing and developing ingredient managing system and recipe recommend system from the commander of ROK Personnel Command, two-star rear admiral.

projects.name: Vehicle CAN Monitoring Software
description: - Developed analyzing and sending signals to CAN Bus Network in car remotely with C# and .Net Winform
- Automatically analyzed Vehicle Can Bus Database and applied by the VIN in the Database
- Made easy to check up the connected car service status and driving performance by utilizing the vehicle's odometer remotely.

projects.name: Tastie, Mobile Application
description: - Developed and operated a mobile application recommending restaurants based on the keywords to avoid suffering searching good restaurants, which in total reached 10K+ users in 2 months.
- Analyzed keywords, user data, and restaurant data collected by quantitating and qualitative methods to improve user experience.
- Improved recommending system and user interface by the discovered insight in analysis.
